title: Java
name: Java
description: Over 7 years of experience in Java development, with expertise in Hibernate and Spring frameworks. Proficient in SOLID architectural patterns, Object-Oriented Programming (OOP), and building scalable, maintainable backend solutions. Experienced in leveraging Spring Boot and Hibernate for efficient database management and seamless application performance.

title: Android
name: Android
description: 5 years of experience in Android development, successfully launching several apps with over 200k downloads. Skilled in creating intuitive, high-performance mobile applications and optimizing user experiences across a variety of devices.

title: Selenium
name: Selenium WebDriver & Web Scraping
description: 5 years of experience implementing automated tests and web scraping solutions with Selenium WebDriver. Expertise in test architecture, optimizing testing frameworks, and efficiently extracting data from websites for analysis, ensuring high-quality and scalable software development.

title: Appium
name: Appium
description: 3 years of expertise in building and implementing automated tests for mobile devices using Appium. Skilled in developing cross-platform testing solutions, ensuring robust and reliable mobile app performance across various devices and operating systems.

title: SEO
name: Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
description: 4 years of experience optimizing e-commerce platforms to improve search engine rankings, drive organic traffic, and enhance user engagement. Expertise in on-page and off-page SEO strategies, keyword research, and implementing best practices for e-commerce SEO success.

title: Hybris
name: SAP Commerce Cloud
description: 4 years of expertise in SAP Commerce Cloud (Hybris) backend development, specializing in HAC (Hybris Administration Console), Backoffice, and WCMS (Web Content Management System) cockpit. Skilled in creating scalable e-commerce solutions, optimizing backend processes, and enhancing user experiences through efficient content management.

title: Swift
name: Swift iOS
description: 2 years of experience in Swift iOS development, with a focus on building user-friendly, high-performance apps. Successfully launched Prokedex, a popular app with positive user feedback and strong engagement.

title: Mysql
name: Mysql
description: 3 years of experience working with MySQL relational databases, specializing in database design, optimization, and query performance. Skilled in ensuring data integrity, efficient data retrieval, and managing large-scale database systems for high-performance applications.

title: Spring
name: Spring Framework
description: 6 years of experience with the Java Spring Framework, specializing in building scalable, secure, and high-performance backend applications. Expertise in Spring Boot, Spring MVC, and integrating various Spring modules to create robust enterprise-level solutions.

title: HTML
name: Hypertext Markup Language (HTML)
description: 6 years of experience in HTML, creating clean, semantic, and accessible web pages. Skilled in structuring content, ensuring cross-browser compatibility, and optimizing web layouts for responsive design.

name: Javascript
description: 3 years of experience in JavaScript, focusing on building dynamic, interactive web applications. Proficient in ES6+, DOM manipulation, and integrating with frontend frameworks to enhance user experiences and functionality.
